Soo i downloaded it i first unloaded the game then clicked setup, i finnished setup, i put the crack in it, replace, i runned stronghold extreme BAM!

"The program can't start because binkw32.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinstalling n etc..."

So I'll just answer a few questions.. 

This contains both Crusader and Extreme.

Steps:

1. There are 2 compressed files. One with the crack one without. Extract both.

2. Under the folder with all the game files, there should be a file called "Autoplay" or "Autorun"
Open it and install the game.

3. Once the game is installed, take the TWO cracks from the folder and replace the ones in the game folder.

4. Play the game. (You can use autorun to play the game, I haven't tried to use the shortcut yet but i'm 99% sure it will work).


Thanks for uploading this torrent.
Sorry I lied you need to play it through the autorun folder.
